sentence.Network_en: Yielding himself to his feelings of worthlessness, he tried to kill himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 他总是觉得自己一无是处, 便企图自杀.

sentence.Network_en: I thought, closing my hands under the sheets and feeling humbled by my own worthlessness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想着, 小手在衾底伸缩着,感出自己的渺小!

sentence.Network_en: He's the best physician that know the worthlessness of the most medicine.
sentence.Network_cn: 凡是知道大部分的药物均属毫无价值者时为最好的医师.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 无用（worthlessness）：认为自己生活毫无价值，充满了失败，一无是处。认为自己对别人带来的只有麻烦不会对任何人有用。
（3）一钱不值( Worthlessness) 　　如：「如果我没能做得像我必须做的那么好；没赢得我必须赢得的赞赏，那我就是毫无价值的人！」 　　 …
...uilty）或自责（self-reproach）及无价值感 （worthlessness）（Brown et al., 1988；Cumming, 1992；Gotham et al., 1986 ）。
This leads to adults who harbour excessive feelings of worthlessness , low self - esteem and self - pity ., 这导致孩子成长为过多的怀有无价值感情 , 缺乏自尊和自我怜悯.

list.abs: ... 8.窝火憋气[ be simmering with rage] 10.窝囊废[ nebbish;hopelessly stupid fellow;good-for-nothing;worthless wretch].
some worthless scoundrels around him and opposed Rehoboam son of Solomon andand not strong enough to resist them .有些无赖的匪徒聚集跟从他，逞强攻击所罗门的儿子罗波安；那时罗波安还幼弱，不能抵挡他们。
It also has advices advice about how to avoid worthless educational programs and accrediting agencies ., 它还提供如何避免无价值的课程和认证机构的建议.
俚语讲... ... exp.to be calm and composed 十分冷静，镇定自如 n.worthless merchandise,junk 没有价值的商品，破烂货 n.money 钱.

entry.tran: 无价值的;不值钱的;没用处的
entry.def: Something that is worthless is of no real value or use.

example.ex: The guarantee could be worthless if the firm goes out of business...
example.tran: 如果厂家倒闭，保修单就会变得毫无用处。

example.ex: Training is worthless unless there is proof that it works.
example.tran: 除非能证明训练有效，否则就是白搭。

entry.def: Someone who is described as worthless is considered to have no good qualities or skills.

example.ex: You feel you really are completely worthless and unlovable.
example.tran: 你会觉得自己真是毫无价值，一点也不讨人喜欢。

means.word_mean: 1. having no qualities that would render it valuable or useful;

sentences.sentence: "the drill sergeant's intent was to convince all the recruits of their worthlessness"

means.word_mean: 2. the quality of being without practical use
